items.title: Sanchez booked in jail, says focus on recovery
items.summary: Former NFL quarterback Mark Sanchez has been booked and released from a jail in Indianapolis, telling a reporter that he was focused on his recovery from stab wounds he suffered in the altercation that resulted in multiple charges against him.

items.summary: Colts quarterback Anthony Richardson Sr. is inactive against the Cardinals after sustaining what the team described as an eye injury during pregame warmups.

items.title: Cards' Vokolek stretchered off with neck injury
items.summary: Cardinals tight end Travis Vokolek was ruled out of Sunday's game against the Colts after suffering a neck injury on a kickoff return early in the first quarter.

items.title: Why the 2025 NFL season has seen a historic number of last-minute drives
items.summary: The 17 games that featured a go-ahead score in the final minute of regulation are the most through five weeks of a season since the merger.
